DOC.brief_summary: The management hilar biliary stricture remain difficult . These stricture classify 4 type ( I , II , III IV ) . In palliative case , endoscopic drainage perform type I II percutaneous drainage perform type IV . There controversy whether partial complete liver drainage do . Furthermore standard drainage type ( metallic stent , plastic stent ) . Morbidity remain high multistage procedure require . This study aim evaluate clinical practice investigator ' center order determine key factor contribute drainage success failure .
DOC.criteria: Age > 18 year Biliary stricture require drainage Contraindication hilar biliary drainage
